00035   LabviewConverter2::LabviewConverter2() : DataSourceProcessor("LabviewConverter2")
00036   {
00037     
00038     _description = "Reads the ascii ahcal labview raw data files. Make sure to not specify any LCIOInputFiles in the steering in order to read the Calice native raw data files ." ;
00039     
00040     registerProcessorParameter( "Data" , 
00041                                 "Initial String to the ahcal data file. i.e. 'Run'"  ,
00042                                 _data ,
00043                                 std::string("run270001.txt") ) ;
00044   
00045     registerProcessorParameter ( "Runnumber", "Runnumber", _runNumber, 270000);    
00046  
00047     registerProcessorParameter ( "SlowControlLineNumber", 
00048                                  "First part of Slow Control Block, HBU 120 lines, EPT 1920 lines,  AHC2M New Labview output 0 lines",
00049                                  _SlowControlLineNumber, 0);    
00050 
00051     registerProcessorParameter( "DetectorType" ,
00052                                 "Type name of the detector. Currently valid identifiers are: AHC2, AHC2M AEC" ,
00053                                 _detectorTypeName,
00054                                 std::string("AHC2M") ) ;
00055 
00056 
00057  
00058   }
00059   
00060   LabviewConverter2*  LabviewConverter2::newProcessor() { 
00061     return new LabviewConverter2 ;
00062   }

00070     
00071   void LabviewConverter2::readDataSource( int numEvents ) {
00072    
00073     /*
00074     if( _detectorTypeName == "AEC" ){
00075     std::setlocale(LC_ALL,"ja_JP");
00076     std::setlocale(LC_TIME, "ja_JP");
00077     }
00078     */
00079 
00080     ifstream file_to_read;
00081     file_to_read.open( _data.c_str() );
00082     
00083     int rn = _runNumber;
00084     
00085     LCRunHeaderImpl* runHdr = new LCRunHeaderImpl ; 
00086     runHdr->setRunNumber( rn ) ;
00087     
00088     string detName("ahcal_next_generation")  ;
00089     runHdr->setDetectorName( detName ) ;
00090     
00091     stringstream description ; 
00092     description << " run: " << rn <<" is the raw data from Labview !" ;
00093     runHdr->setDescription( description.str()  ) ;
00094     
00095     ProcessorMgr::instance()->processRunHeader( runHdr  ) ;
00096     
00097     int read[9];
00098     //int read[12];
00099     int nCol = 9;
00100     //int nCol = 12;
00101     
00102     int currentCycleNr = 1;
00103     int lastCycleNr = 1;
00104     bool CycleNrChanged = false;
00105     
00106     int LcioEventNr = 0;
00107     
00108     map< int, vector<rawData> > rData;
00109 
00110     rawData blockData;
00111     
00112     string line;
00113     
00114     size_t foundDate;
00115     string strDate ("Date");
00116 
00117     size_t foundUnixtime;
00118     string strUnixtime ("Unixtime");
00119 
00120 
00121     size_t foundTepmetrature = 0;
00122     string strTemperature("Temperatures");
00123     int TemperatureTimeRange[2] = {0,0};
00124     bool writeoutTemperature = false;
00125     float TSensor[6] = {0,0,0,0,0,0};
00126 
00127     int iEvtTime = 0;
00128     
00129     int SlowControlLineCounter = 0; //First 1920 lines in each CERN testbeam
00130 
00131     // **********************************************************
00132     //        Processing data
00133     //  build events according to the different BunchXID 
00134     //  within one CycleNr, and remove them, 
00135     //  until all collected data have been asigned to an event.
00136     //  Then readin the next CycleNr raw data.
00137     // **********************************************************
00138     while (!file_to_read.eof()) {
00139       
00140       for( int i = 0; i<nCol; i++) { read[i] = 0;}
00141       
00142       getline(file_to_read, line);
00143       //if(line[0] == '#') continue; //for comments
00144       
00145       if(line[0] == '#'){
00146         
00147         //Read SlowControl block
00148         //Read first 1920 lines for EPT SlowControl, HBU is 120 lines.
00149         if (SlowControlLineCounter < _SlowControlLineNumber )
00150           {
00151             m_out(MESSAGE) << line <<endl;
00152             SlowControl << line;
00153             SlowControlLineCounter++;
00154           }
00155 
00156 
00157 
00158         //Read on Date/Time
00159         foundDate = line.find(strDate);
00160         if (foundDate!=string::npos) {
00161           //line.erase (0,20);
00162           //size_t foundDate2 = line.find(".");
00163           //if (foundDate2!=string::npos) {
00164           //  line.erase (foundDate2,1);
00165           //}
00166           m_out(MESSAGE) <<" These events have been collected on date: " << line <<endl; 
00167           
00168           // convert this string into timestamp
00169           struct tm tm;
00170           //if ( strptime(line.c_str(), "%d %m %Y %H:%M:%S", &tm) != NULL ){
00171           if( _detectorTypeName == "AHC2"){
00172             line.erase (0,20);
00173             if ( strptime(line.c_str(), "%d. %b %Y %H:%M:%S", &tm) != NULL ){
00174               time_t evtTimeDAQ;
00175               evtTimeDAQ = mktime(&tm);
00176               iEvtTime = (int)evtTimeDAQ;
00177               m_out(MESSAGE) <<" And the Unix UTC Timestamp  is "  << evtTimeDAQ <<endl;
00178             }
00179             else {
00180               cout <<"Something wrong for the Timestamp in detector AHC2!"<<endl;
00181             }
00182           }
00183           else if( _detectorTypeName == "AEC"){
00184             line.erase (0,20);
00185             
00186             if ( strptime(line.c_str(), "%d. %b %Y %H:%M:%S", &tm) != NULL ){
00187               time_t evtTimeDAQ;
00188               evtTimeDAQ = mktime(&tm);
00189               iEvtTime = (int)evtTimeDAQ;
00190               m_out(MESSAGE) <<" And the Unix UTC Timestamp  is "  << evtTimeDAQ <<endl;
00191             }
00192             else {
00193               cout <<"Something wrong for the Timestamp in detector AEC!"<<endl;
00194               
00195             }
00196           }
00197           else {
00198             cout <<"Something wrong for the Timestamp!"<<endl;
00199             return;
00200           }
00201         }
00202 
00203         foundUnixtime = line.find(strUnixtime);
00204         if (foundUnixtime!=string::npos) {
00205 
00206           line.erase (0,12);
00207           stringstream(line)>>iEvtTime;
00208 
00209           m_out(MESSAGE) <<" These events have been collected on date: " << line <<endl; 
00210 
00211 
00212         }
00213 
00214 
00215 
00216         //Read temperature
00217         foundTepmetrature = line.find(strTemperature);
00218 
00219         if (foundTepmetrature!=string::npos) {
00220 
00221           //Lastone
00222           TemperatureTimeRange[1] = TemperatureTimeRange[0];
00223           TemperatureTimeRange[0] = iEvtTime;
00224 
00225           if(writeoutTemperature)
00226             m_out(MESSAGE) <<TSensor[0]<<"   "
00227                            <<TSensor[1]<<"   "
00228                            <<TSensor[2]<<"   "
00229                            <<TSensor[3]<<"   "
00230                            <<TSensor[4]<<"   "
00231                            <<TSensor[5]<<"   "
00232                            <<"From "<<TemperatureTimeRange[0]
00233                            <<"  until "<<TemperatureTimeRange[1]
00234                            <<endl;
00235           
00236           //writeoutTemperature = true;
00237           writeoutTemperature = false;
00238 
00239           //New one
00240           line.erase (0,17);
00241 
00242           m_out(MESSAGE) <<" And at this moment, the Temperatures are: " <<endl;
00243           m_out(MESSAGE) << line <<endl;
00244           stringstream stream;
00245 
00246 
00247           if( _detectorTypeName == "AHC2") {
00248             stream.imbue(locale("german"));
00249             //stream.imbue(std::locale("De_DE"));
00250             stream << line;
00251             stream>>TSensor[0]>>TSensor[1]>>TSensor[2]>>TSensor[3]>>TSensor[4]>>TSensor[5];
00252           }
00253           else if ( _detectorTypeName == "AEC") {
00254              stringstream(line)>>TSensor[0]>>TSensor[1]>>TSensor[2]>>TSensor[3]>>TSensor[4]>>TSensor[5];
00255           }
00256           else{
00257             cout << "This detecot type: "<< _detectorTypeName <<" is not valid identifiers currently!\n"
00258                       << "Currently valid identifiers are: AHC2 and AEC "<< endl;
00259             return;
00260           }
00261 
00262         }
00263         
00264         continue; //for comments in the txt file start with "#"
00265       }
00266       
00267       //  Sebastian Laurien : Email 5/23/2013 10:26 AM
00268       //it is now
00269       //Readoutcycle>>BXid>>ASICid>>memcell>>Ch>>TDC>>ADC>>HitBit>>GainBit;
00270       stringstream(line)>>read[0]>>read[1]>>read[2]>>read[3]>>read[4]>>read[5]>>read[6]>>read[7]>>read[8];
00271       //stringstream(line)>>read[0]>>read[1]>>read[2]>>read[3]>>read[4]>>read[5]>>read[6]>>read[7]>>read[8]>>read[9]>>read[10]>>read[11];
00272       //0:BunchXID 1:CycleNr 2:ChipID2 3:Smt 4:EvtNr 5:chan 6:TDC 7:ADC (or 6:ADC_HG 7:ADC_LG) 8:Smt 9:Smt 10:Hit_Bit 11:Gain_Bit
00273 
00274       //In convert_root: &BunchXID, &CycleNr, &ChipID2, &EvtNr, &chn, &TDC, &ADC, &Hit_Bit, &Gain_Bit
00275       
00276       blockData.iCyNr = read[0];
00277       blockData.iBxID = read[1];
00278       blockData.iCpID = read[2];
00279       blockData.iEvNr = read[3];
00280       blockData.iChan = read[4];
00281       blockData.iTDC  = read[5];
00282       blockData.iADC  = read[6];
00283       blockData.iHBit = read[7];
00284       blockData.iGBit = read[8];
00285 
00286       //Shaojun's order
00287       /*
00288       blockData.iCyNr = read[1];
00289       blockData.iBxID = read[0];
00290       blockData.iCpID = read[2];
00291       blockData.iEvNr = read[4];
00292       blockData.iChan = read[5];
00293       blockData.iTDC  = read[7];
00294       blockData.iADC  = read[6];
00295       blockData.iHBit = read[10];
00296       blockData.iGBit = read[11];
00297       */
00298 
00299       m_out(DEBUG0) <<"  BXID: "<<read[0] <<" CycleNr: "<<read[1] <<" ChipID: "<<read[2]<<"  Channel: " <<read[4] << std::endl;
00300       
00301       currentCycleNr = read[0];
00302       m_out(DEBUG0) <<"lastCycleNr "  << lastCycleNr << " currentCycleNr " << currentCycleNr << endl;
00303       
00304       if( lastCycleNr != currentCycleNr )
00305         {         
00306           m_out(DEBUG0) <<"(lastCycleNr != currentCycleNr) : lastCycleNr: "<< lastCycleNr<<"  currentCycleNr:"<<currentCycleNr << endl;
00307           CycleNrChanged = true;
00308           lastCycleNr = currentCycleNr;
00309           
00310           if( CycleNrChanged )
00311             {
00312                m_out(DEBUG0) <<" rData.size(): "<<rData.size() << endl;
00313               
00314                for(  map< int, vector<rawData> >::iterator it=rData.begin(); it!=rData.end();it++ )
00315                 {
00316                   
00317                   //m_out(MESSAGE)<< " ===== LabviewConverter2 processing Event "<< LcioEventNr <<"  ======" << endl;
00318                   LCEventImpl*  evt = new LCEventImpl() ;
00319                   
00320  
00321                   LCCollectionVec *colECAL = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00322                   LCCollectionVec *colHCAL = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00323                  
00324                   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < it->second.size(); i++ )
00325                     {
00326                       int iBxID = it->second.at(i).iBxID;
00327                       int iCyNr = it->second.at(i).iCyNr;
00328                       int iCpID = it->second.at(i).iCpID;
00329                       int iEvNr = it->second.at(i).iEvNr;
00330                       int iChan = it->second.at(i).iChan;
00331                       int iTDC  = it->second.at(i).iTDC;
00332                       int iADC  = it->second.at(i).iADC;
00333                       int iHBit = it->second.at(i).iHBit;
00334                       int iGBit = it->second.at(i).iGBit;
00335 
00336                   
00337                       LabviewBlock2 * lBlock = new LabviewBlock2(iCyNr, iBxID, iCpID, iEvNr, iChan, 
00338                                                                iTDC, iADC, iHBit, iGBit);
00339 
00340                      
00341                       if (iCpID>=129 && iCpID<=140)
00342                         colECAL->addElement( lBlock );
00343                       else{
00344                         colHCAL->addElement( lBlock );
00345                         
00346                       }               
00347                     }
00348                 
00349                   LcioEventNr++; //Event start from 1.
00350                   
00351                   evt->setRunNumber(  rn   ) ;
00352                   evt->setEventNumber( LcioEventNr ) ;
00353                   LCTime evttime( iEvtTime ) ;
00354                   evt->setTimeStamp( evttime.timeStamp()  ) ;
00355                   evt->addCollection( colECAL, "LabviewDataECAL" );
00356                   evt->addCollection( colHCAL, "LabviewDataHCAL" );
00357 
00358                   //if(foundTepmetrature!=string::npos){
00359                   if (writeoutTemperature){
00360                     LCCollectionVec *TCol = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00361             
00362                     for( int i = 0; i<6; i++){
00363                       float temp = TSensor[i];      
00364                       TempSensorBlock  *TSensor = new TempSensorBlock(i, temp);
00365                       TCol->addElement(TSensor );
00366                     }
00367             
00368                     evt->addCollection( TCol, "TSensor");
00369                     foundTepmetrature = 0;
00370                     writeoutTemperature = false;
00371                   }
00372           
00373                   ProcessorMgr::instance()->processEvent( evt ) ;
00374 
00375                   // ------------ IMPORTANT ------------- !
00376                   // we created the event so we need to delete it ...
00377                   delete evt ;
00378 
00379                 } // loop map key to save the event with each CycleNr.
00380 
00381             } // finished the current CycleNr.
00382 
00383           // start next CycleNr.
00384           CycleNrChanged = false;
00385           rData.clear();    
00386   
00387         } // if the current Cycle is completed read in
00388       
00389       m_out(DEBUG0) <<"lastCycleNr==currentCycleNr : lastCycleNr: "<< lastCycleNr<<"  currentCycleNr:"<<currentCycleNr << endl;
00390 
00391       rData[read[1]].push_back(blockData);
00392 
00393     }
00394 
00395 
00396     file_to_read.close();
00397     
00398     delete runHdr ;
00399     
00400   }

00404   void LabviewConverter2::end() {    
00405     m_out(MESSAGE) <<" ===== End of LabviewConverter2 processor ===== " <<  endl;
00406   }
